questionText.text: Which city is famously known as the 'City of Light'?

quiz.instructionText: Select the correct answer and select Submit.

correctFbText.text: Correct: Paris is known as the 'City of Light'.

wrongFbText.text: Incorrect: The correct answer is Paris.

questionText.text: Which of the following countries are in Europe?
